title: Block: Post Type Filter Grid v3

fields.label: Top level filters active on load
fields.name: top_level_filters_active_on_load

fields.label: Enable load more button
fields.name: enable_load_more_button
fields.message: Turn this off if you only want to show the first page of results

fields.label: Custom image sizes
fields.name: custom_image_sizes
fields.instructions: This overrides the default image attribute, eg. (min-width: 1440px) 100vw, (min-width: 1024px) 1024px, (min-width: 768px) 768px, (min-width: 500px) 100vw, 250px

fields.label: Enable micro grid gap
fields.name: enable_micro_grid_gap
fields.message: This will replace the standard grid gap with a very thin 1-5px grid gap instead

fields.label: Post container grid template rows
fields.name: post_container_grid_template_rows
fields.instructions: This field accepts css grid template rows/columns syntax

fields.label: Post container grid template columns
fields.name: post_container_grid_template_columns
fields.instructions: This field accepts css grid template rows/columns syntax

fields.label: Enable Post Cover link hover effect
fields.name: enable_post_cover_link_hover_effect

description: Library version - Do not modify in this project as any changes will be overwritten by future updates.
